title: [1.7~1.8][16x]Candles and Clockwork材质以及音效包，利用光影体现柔化美！
author: 西木凛
txt_content:
本帖最后由 西木凛 于 2015-1-19 19:20 编辑 






tumblr_n2ujr9N1uh1t9u0nlo4_1280.png (157.52 KB, 下载次数: 287)

下载附件

2015-1-19 18:32 上传




作者原话You must be wondering, “How much of this did you create yourself rather than adopt from DTG or whatever?” Well, since I was on the team that textured DTG’s original version (very shortly, however, and the version I helped with was never posted), I textured maybe 20 of the original block textures and all of the currently completed items.  Other than those textures, everything was either revamped or redone by me. No textures are the same as they were in the original version, especially not any mapping. Again, if you don’t believe me (which I’m sure someone won't considering this is, after all, PMC) then check out [url=http://www.planetminecraft.com/blog/candles-and-clockwork-revival---a-thanks-to-dat-tree-gaming/]THIS POST for proof and more info on DTG giving me ownership of their pack.  





2014-05-19_151734.jpg (80.36 KB, 下载次数: 283)

下载附件

2015-1-19 18:50 上传





这个材质做的纹理似乎并不是很好，还有月亮...不过岩浆是逆流的！如果你不喜欢可以把该资源删了！如果你不注意这些岩浆细节以及开上些低配光影柔化一下！这款材质会比你想象中美很多！
